articles.author: David J. Lynch
articles.title: Bernanke, two other Americans win Nobel Prize in economics - The Washington Post
articles.description: Ben Bernanke, the former Fed chair, Douglas W. Diamond of the University of Chicago and Philip H. Dybvig of Washington University in St. Louis were awarded the prize for research on banks and financial crises.
articles.content: Former Federal Reserve chair Ben S. Bernanke, Douglas W. Diamond of the University of Chicago and Philip H. Dybvig of Washington University in St. Louis were awarded the Nobel Memorial Prize in Econo… [+5088 chars]

articles.title: Panacea Biotec receives UNICEF & PAHO awards for supply of Pentavalent Vaccine - Equity Bulls
articles.description: Panacea Biotec,  has received long-term supply awards worth US$ 127.30 million from UNICEF and Pan American Health Organization for supply of its WHO pre-qualified fully liquid Pentavalent vaccine, Easyfive-TT - DTwP-HepB-Hib.
articles.content: Panacea Biotec, one of India's leading biotechnology companies, has received long-term supply awards worth US$ 127.30 million (around INR 1,040 Crore) from UNICEF and Pan American Health Organization… [+2288 chars]

articles.author: Zahra Tayeb
articles.title: Russia applauds OPEC+ for its huge oil output cut, reportedly saying it will counter the 'mayhem' the US has created in the market - Yahoo Canada
articles.description: "This at least balances the mayhem that the Americans are causing," Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said of the OPEC+ production cuts, per media reports.
articles.content:
Russia's government has hailed OPEC+ for making a massive cut to oil production targets, reportedly saying it balances out the "mayhem" the US has spread in global energy markets.
